name: sleeper-ff-bot
description: A GroupMe/Slack/Discord Bot for Sleeper fantasy leagues

BOT_TYPE.description: The type of Bot. Options are groupme, slack, or discord.

CLOSE_NUM.description: How close a game score needs to be to be considered close.

NUMBER_OF_PLAYOFF_TEAMS.description: The number of playoff teams in the league.

WEBHOOK.description: The Discord Webhook for spammy test stuff.

ANNOUNCEMENTS_WEBHOOK.description: The Discord Webhook to stick it in the main channel.

CHAT_BOT_TOKEN.description: The Discord token for the bot.
